attributes.attribute: Aero is a smart and extremely versatile modular display system that is very easy to transport and assemble, making it ideal for all types of display application.

<STRONG><FONT color=#ff0000>Suitable for indoor use only</FONT></STRONG>;3 single sided pull-down roller banners mounted onto telescopic support posts and bases (2 banners 1000mm wide, 1 banner 1500mm wide);Choice of 3 fixed visible graphic heights: 1010mm, 1510mm and 2010mm;Lightweight anodised aluminium components;Supplied complete with two mounting points for spot or floodlighting (lighting is not included);Banners can be positioned to create a flat back-wall or can be angled to fit a variety of display spaces;Aero's modular design makes it easy to expand the display by linking additional kits together;Supplied with carry bags
Cassette to be used in conjunction with Aero Pole & Base UB211
<STRONG><FONT color=#ff0000>Suitable for indoor use only</FONT></STRONG>;2 widths available - 1000mm and 1500mm;silver finish
Single pole and base to be used in conjunction with the Aero roller cassettes (UB213)
<STRONG><FONT color=#ff0000>Suitable for indoor use only</FONT></STRONG>;3 different height settings;Sturdy base for extra stability

Stylish design and proven reliability makes Barracuda our most popular quality banner stand. Barracuda is the most feature-rich single-sided roller banner available and has been specially designed for maximum convenience and ease of use.

2130mm max high x 800 or 1000mm wide visible graphic area (add 300mm to allow for roller mechanism;Available in anodised silver;Charcoal grey end caps;Internal graphic housing designed to accommodate graphic media up to 450 microns thick<FONT color=#ff0000>*</FONT>;Universal Grippa/Self adhesive top rail;Secure slide in graphic system;Ratchet tensioner;Twist & Lock telescopic pole;Supplied with quality foam padded carry bag;<FONT color=#ff0000>*Please test your substrate suitability before use</FONT>

New styling;High specification finish and cast chrome metal end plates;Access roller via flip-top lid;Removable self-locking graphic roller;Quick change graphic slider;Adjustable feet on base, useful, for example on uneven floors;Premium carry bag;Available in 800 and 1000mm widths;Increased internal housing for thicker graphics (up to 450 microns);Fixed height bungee pole;Visible graphic area 2120mm (h) x 800 or 1000mm (w);300mm bleed;<strong>Please note that the 800mm width unit is an Off the Shelf item</strong>
A lightweight economy roller banner with slim base and bungee pole making it very compact, complete with a twist out foot for extra stability.

Lightweight components;Re-usable quick-change snap top rail*;Low profile hook/loop fastening quick change graphic application;Twist out stabilising foot for extra stability;Available in anodised silver;800mm and 1000mm graphic widths;Visible graphic area: 2010mm (h) x 800 or 1000mm (w) approx;Includes quality padded carry bag<STRONG>;*Quick change snap top rail is being phased in for 1000mm wide Ecos (Currently 1000mm wide Ecos are supplied with spring loaded clamp style top</STRONG> <STRONG>rails)</STRONG>;<FONT color=#ff0000>Please test your graphic substrate suitability before use</FONT>;<strong>Please note that the Eco 1000mm width unit is Custom Made to Order</strong>

Stylish design and proven reliability makes Excaliber a popular quality banner stand for prestige locations. Excaliber is the most feature-rich single sided roller banner available and has been specially designed for maximum convenience and ease of use.

Previously known as the Stretch banner, the Original Banner 1 is based on a very popular design, this versatile roller banner is lightweight, portable and very simple to use
